# Formio
**This app has no affiliation with Google.**
The animated clocks found in this app are based on typefaces that were originally designed by Google. Each typeface was created for use in promotional material for specific company events.
I made this app because I found each of them delightful and thought they still deserve to be enjoyed.

# FORM
FORM was a 2014 Google conference focussing on design and technology. Its branding featured a unique typeface which was adapted into an [Android Wear watchface](https://experiments.withgoogle.com/form-watch-face) by [Roman Nurik](https://roman.nurik.net/).
Google introduced the original version of [Material Design](https://material.io) that same year. The FORM typeface compliments this with each character comprised of paper-like blocks of color tessellating and folding together.

# I/O
[Google I/O](https://io.google/) is a developer conference held annually since 2008. Its keynote presentation is often used to announce new products.

# IO16
The 2016 I/O website featured an animated countdown where each character was represented by a simple wireframe and burst into color whenever the digits changed.

# IO18
Again, the 2018 I/O website featured a bespoke animated countdown, this time with simple geometric elements playfully combining to create each digit.
